sentences.en: After gaining independence in 1957, it was renamed ‘Ghana’.
sentences.cn: 1957年获得独立后，该国改名为“加纳”。

sentences.en: Carrie’s gained a lot of weight recently.
sentences.cn: 卡丽的体重最近增加了很多。

sentences.en: Eating too many fatty foods could cause weight gain.
sentences.cn: 过多食用高脂食物会导致体重增加。

sentences.en: Ensure that whatever you gain now will be for keeps.
sentences.cn: 确保你现在所获得的一切永远不会失去。

sentences.en: Hundreds of people were unable to gain admittance to the hall.
sentences.cn: 数以百计的人未能获准进入大厅。

sentences.en: I was able to gain invaluable experience over that year.
sentences.cn: 在那一年里我有幸获得了非常宝贵的经验。

sentences.en: It exposes the fallacy of short-term industrial gain at long-term environmental expense.
sentences.cn: 这暴露了以长久的环境破坏为代价换取短期工业利益的错误。

sentences.en: The company is eager to gain a foothold in Europe.
sentences.cn: 这家公司急于在欧洲取得一席之地。

sentences.en: The Democratic Party needed a net gain of only 20 votes.
sentences.cn: 民主党只需要增20张选票。

sentences.en: The gain will be commensurately modest.
sentences.cn: 相应地，收益不会太多。

sentences.en: The Mercedes began to gain on the van.
sentences.cn: 那辆奔驰开始逼近小货车。

sentences.en: The minuses far outweigh that possible gain.
sentences.cn: 弊端远远大于那可能获得的收益。

sentences.en: The party made considerable gains at local elections.
sentences.cn: 该党在地方选举中的成绩明显提高了。

sentences.en: The scales registered a gain of 1.3 kilograms.
sentences.cn: 称重显示增加了1.3千克。

sentences.en: They worry that extremists might gain control.
sentences.cn: 他们担心极端分子可能会取得控制权。

sentences.en: Through superior production techniques they were able to gain the competitive edge.
sentences.cn: 凭借先进的生产技术，他们得以占据竞争优势。

sentences.en: to gain a high level of competence in English
sentences.cn: 获得高水平的英语能力

sentences.en: to gain hands-on experience of industry
sentences.cn: 获得勤劳工作的实际经验

sentences.en: We had not been able to gain admittance to the flat.
sentences.cn: 我们未能获准进入公寓。

sentences.en: White wines tend to gain depth of colour with age.
sentences.cn: 白葡萄酒年头愈久，颜色愈深。

words.tran_cn: 唯利是图的；有利益的；赚钱的

phrases.tran_cn: 经济成果，经济收益；经济增长
增长，改进；获得；在…方面有进展
羸得时间：延迟或拖延直到希望的事件发生

trans.tran_en: an advantage or improvement, especially one achieved by planning or effort
to obtain or achieve something you want or need

trans.tran_cn: 获得，受益，增加，走得太快，到达
trans.tran_en: to obtain or achieve something you want or need
to obtain or achieve something you want or need
